Articles.Content:
Hi!

Is it possible to add the taptalk plugin to this forum?

I'm new here and I prefer using taptalk than a regular browser... It's KSP on the move!

It's quite simple - https://tapatalk.com/activate_tapatalk.php?plugin=vbulletin

Thanks and sorry to bother,

Eunito.

This has come up a number of times in the past, and as far as I know, the Tapatalk plugin is considered too much a security risk by the higher-ups to be implemented on this forum.

Sorry. :|
